translation.zh: 如来佛祖掌管着全宇宙

translation.en: And the Immortal Ones in heaven
We respected the gods, and we followed the rules
translation.zh: 我们尊重神仙 遵守规定

translation.en: until the night a magical rock
translation.zh: 直到那晚 一颗有魔力的石头里

translation.en: gave birth to a powerful being.
translation.zh: 蹦出了一个强大的生物

translation.en: We have important business to discuss.
translation.zh: 我们有重要的事情要谈

translation.en: Architect of the Universe and Lord of the Immortals,
translation.zh: 宇宙构建者 众仙之首

translation.en: shall throw the greatest, most fantastic banquet
translation.zh: 将举办自上周二的宴会起

translation.en: since the one we did last Tuesday.
Place the Immortal Ones at my head table.
Minor gods by the kitchen in the back--
translation.zh: 小仙坐在后面的厨房旁边…

translation.en: Hm, an uncontrollable monkey shooting light beams from his eyes?
translation.zh: 一只失控的猴子用眼睛发射光线？

translation.en: He's probably just excited, Your Majesty.
We can't have that. Get rid of him.
translation.zh: 不能让他得逞 除掉他

translation.en: Buddha! I didn't see you there.
[Buddha] This monkey is a powerful being.
translation.zh: 这猴子是个强大的生物

translation.en: I mean, what's the worst it can do, right?
I'm thinking a ten-foot egg tart sculpture of me.
translation.zh:
我考虑做一个我的蛋挞雕塑
要三米高

translation.en: A wise monkey never stretches beyond his grasp.
translation.zh: 智慧的猴子不会做力所不能及的事

translation.en: if the coconut is meant for us,
translation.zh: 如果那个椰子注定是我们的

translation.en: -We live in a world of rules and order. -Oh?
translation.zh: 这个世界没有规矩不成方圆

translation.en: Think of my palm as our universe.
translation.zh: 把我的手掌想象成宇宙

translation.en: one little monkey is an insignificant pebble.
translation.zh:
一只小猴子
不过是个微不足道的小石子

translation.en: Only the Immortal Ones in heaven are free to live without rules.
translation.zh: 只有天上的神仙可以不遵守规矩

translation.en: [elder monkey] Come back here right this minute!
Your recklessness drew the Demon of Havoc upon us.
translation.zh: 你的顽劣把灭绝魔王引来了
你不属于这里 野猴子！

translation.en: Ha ha! Okay, imaginary family, give me some love.
translation.zh: 好 想象中的家庭 给我一点爱

translation.en: [elder monkey] Come. Gather 'round, young ones. Aw.
translation.zh: 来 集合 年轻人

translation.en: -You again? -You're in danger! Follow me and-- [gasps]
I, uh, thought that would play out differently.
You fool! You think you're some kind of hero?
translation.zh: 你个笨蛋！你以为自己是英雄吗？

translation.en: But I can beat that thing.

translation.zh: 当然 如果有时间的话

translation.en: Coconuts are no threat to the Demon of Havoc.
translation.zh: 椰子对灭绝魔王构不成威胁

translation.en: -He could get a weapon. -Ha. From where?
Oh, oh, I know! From the Dragon King.
[scoffs] At the bottom of the sea?
If you go out there, you will die.
translation.zh: 如果你去那儿 你会死的

translation.en: [henchman 1] Coming to the stage, let's give it up for…
this grand column has stood here since the dawn of time.
translation.zh:
这根巨大的柱子
自开天辟地以来就伫立于此

translation.en: It has waited patiently for the mightiest, fiercest rebel
translation.zh: 它耐心地等待着最强大、最凶猛

translation.en: with the best style, of course,
My gorgeous machine will unleash the column's power
translation.zh:
我美轮美奂的底座
将释放擎天柱的力量

translation.en: to create the greatest storm the world has ever seen.
translation.zh: 掀起有史以来最大的暴风雨

translation.en: You've been waiting for me? How long?
translation.zh: 你一直在等我？等了多久了？

translation.en: The days when sea creatures are looked down upon
translation.zh:
海洋生物
被呼吸空气的陆栖动物看不起的日子

translation.en: by those air-breathing dry-landers are over!
You're looking for the most powerful being?
translation.zh: 你在寻找最强大的生物吗？

translation.en: No way! I'm actually on a quest for the ultimate weapon!
translation.zh: 不是吧！我正在寻找一件终极武器！

translation.en: There's gotta be some way we can help each other.
If you were just a little smaller, maybe I could--
translation.zh: 如果你能变小一点 也许我可以…

translation.en: But first, a song. And five, six, seven, eight!
translation.zh: 首先 献歌一曲 五 六 七 起！

translation.en: [Dragon King] Someone's stealing the grand column! Is that a monkey?
translation.zh: 有人在偷擎天柱！那是只猴子吗？

translation.en: -[cuttlefish] Excuse me, sire, but-- -Zip it. I have a call to make.
translation.zh:
-不好意思 殿下 可是…
-闭嘴 我要打个电话

translation.en: Oh, it's you. What is it? I'm busy.
translation.zh: 是你 什么事？我很忙

translation.en: A monkey stole my grand column.
translation.zh: 一只猴子偷了我的擎天柱

translation.en: So? Someone could do a lot of damage with that thing. Theoretically.
translation.zh:
所以？那柱子可能会被人利用
做很多恶事

translation.en: You're a king. You handle it. I believe in you.
translation.zh: 你是国王 你来处理 我相信你

translation.en: Perhaps you could escalate this to the big guy? Delegate up?
translation.zh:
也许你可以把这件事
上报到“老大”那儿？

translation.en: "Remember that stone monkey you said to leave alone?"
translation.zh: 还记得你说别管他的那只石猴吗？

translation.en: "Well, it took a stick. We're all scared. Please save us."
translation.zh:
他拿了根棍子
我们好害怕 请救救我们”

translation.en: Very well. I shall take things into my own claws, and woe to those that-- Oh!
translation.zh:
很好 那我就自作主张了
准备好受死…

translation.en: So it's the monkey who's the mightiest, fiercest rebel.
translation.zh: 所以最强大凶猛有型的反叛者

translation.en: Yeah. And he swiped the one thing you need to take over the world.
translation.zh:
对
他把你用来控制世界的东西顺走了

translation.en: Any other comments? Input? Friendly feedback?
translation.zh: 还有其他意见吗？友好的反馈？

translation.en: No? Then draw me a bath!
translation.zh: 没有？那就给我放洗澡水

translation.en: -[monkey 2] He didn't die. -[monkey 3] He got a weapon.
translation.zh: 他没有死 他拿到了武器

translation.en: Hold on? What do you mean "hold on"?
-Stay here and keep a lookout. -[Stick murmurs]
If you're so smart, you do it.
translation.zh: 你这么聪明 你来啊

translation.en: Oh yeah! Awesome. I get it now.
translation.zh: 哦耶！太棒了 我明白了

translation.en: Wave bye-bye to the nice kitty.
Bad kitty god! Ow, ow, ow, ow, ow!
I like it. Has a nice ring to it.
The ultimate weapon for the ultimate hero!

translation.zh: 你是个小石子儿 记得吗？

translation.en: He just wants you to love him!
You'll never be one of us.
translation.zh: 你绝不会成为我们中的一员
你是个自私又叛逆的傻瓜

translation.en: who will end up all alone.
[scoffs] I'm not alone. I have my Stick.
translation.zh: 我不孤独 我有我的金箍棒

translation.en: That weapon should be wielded by one of the Immortal Ones.
translation.zh: 那把武器该为神仙所用

translation.en: So wait. You're saying I should be an Immortal One?
translation.zh: 等等 你是说 我应该是神仙？

translation.en: They do whatever they want up there, right? That's me.
translation.zh:
他们在上面想做什么做什么 对吧？
我也这样

translation.en: -Best weapons? Uh-huh. Very much us. -[Stick murmurs]
translation.zh: 最好的武器？那就是我们了

translation.en: You're right. I don't belong here.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我不属于这里

translation.en: They'd never accept the likes of you.
translation.zh: 他们永远不会接受你这样的人

translation.en: You'd have to defeat a hundred demons to even get their attention.
translation.zh:
你得打败一百个妖怪
他们才会抬眼看看你

translation.en: -I suppose you're right. -[scoffs] Of course I'm right.
translation.zh: 是啊 你说得对 我当然是对的

translation.en: ♪ Who's the handsome hero We all love and adore? ♪
translation.zh: 谁是人见人爱的帅气英雄？

translation.en: ♪ Who has demons screaming When he knocks on their door? ♪
translation.zh: 谁让妖魔鬼怪闻风丧胆？

translation.en: ♪ Who's a mighty fighter Who is brave and spunky ♪
translation.zh: 谁是骁勇善战 身材健硕的

translation.en: ♪ And also a bit of a hunk? ♪
♪ Who's the ape you can't escape When he hunts you down? ♪
translation.zh: 谁是让人无处遁形的猴？

translation.en: ♪ Who's the chimp All the simple people will crown? ♪
♪ Who's the simian you'll find shimmying Up to the top ♪
translation.zh: 谁是轻轻一跃就冲上云霄

translation.en: ♪ And you know he won't stop Till he's won? ♪
translation.zh: 不打败对手不罢休的猴？

translation.en: ♪ That's right, it's the Monkey King! ♪
Ninety-nine demons down. One to go.
translation.zh: 打倒了99个妖怪 还剩一个
千载难逢的英雄见面会

-走开！
-它会听见的！ -离我们远点
-你会害死我们

translation.en: AKA the Simian Savior. AKA the Legendary Demon Slayer.
translation.zh: 又名救世猿 又名传奇猎魔人

translation.en: Our amazing skills include pole-fighting, punching,
translation.zh: 我们的绝技包括棍法、拳法

translation.en: kicking, a kick-pole punch combo, the double-kick with or without Stick,
translation.zh:
踢腿、踢腿棍法混合
配合或不配合金箍棒的二连踢

translation.en: or the ever-popular fake kick with a spinning pole.
translation.zh: 还有最受欢迎的假踢转棍

translation.en: -Well, I've never heard of you either. -[Stick murmurs]
This village needs one of the Immortal Ones.
-Not a monkey with a fancy stick. -[Stick murmurs]
This dump counts as a village? Come on!
translation.zh: 这垃圾场也算村子？拜托

translation.en: -He's just gonna make it worse. -[scoffs] Get rid of him.
translation.zh:
他只会让情况更糟 -赶他走
-谢谢你跑一趟

translation.en: I don't think you're getting how great I am--
translation.zh: 我觉得你们不懂我有多…

translation.en: He's the real deal, folks. A living legend.
translation.zh: 他是真的厉害 当代传奇

translation.en: I am? I mean, of course I am.
If you've got a demon situation, this is your guy.
translation.zh: 如果你们被妖怪所困 找他就对了

translation.en: Where did you even come from, kid?
translation.zh: 你从哪里来的 孩子？

translation.en: I've never seen her before, and I'm the mayor's wife.
translation.zh: 我从没见过她 我是村长夫人

translation.en: You'd better get to know us. Unless you wanna be demon dumplings.
translation.zh:
你要是不想被妖怪当成饺子吃
最好赶紧认识我们

translation.en: Maybe the demon will eat the monkey.

translation.zh: 不管怎样我们都有好处

translation.en: My poor, dear child was just kidnapped.
translation.zh: 我可怜的孩子被绑架了

translation.en: Every rainy season, the horrible fire beast descends--
translation.zh: 每个雨季 可怕的火怪都会降临…

translation.en: -Fire beast? That'll be a hundred demons. -[Stick shouts]
translation.zh: 火怪？那就凑满一百个妖怪了

translation.en: -I'm in. Okay, desperate peasants. -Where's he going?
translation.zh: 我加入 好了 绝望的农民 他要去哪里？

translation.en: -Let's talk about my ascension ceremony. -Ascension ceremony?
translation.zh:
-我们来谈谈我的升仙大典
-升仙大典？

translation.en: How else will the Immortal Ones know it's time to come get me?
translation.zh: 不然神仙怎么会知道何时来迎接我？

-好 我需要一个35人的乐团
-不！
还有一场盛大的烟花表演

translation.en: Unfortunately, ours is but a poor rice-farming village.
translation.zh:
很不幸
我们的村子不过是个贫穷的水稻村

translation.en: How insulting. Come on, King. We're walking.
translation.zh: 真是侮辱人 美猴王 我们走

translation.en: Please, won't you and your assistant reconsider?
translation.zh:
拜托
你和你的助理能不能再考虑一下？

translation.en: Assistant? I don't know this person. Who are you?
translation.zh: 助理？我不认识这个人 你是谁？

translation.en: I mean, this guy took down the white bone demon,
the red bone demon, and the bone demon of no specific color.
translation.zh: 红骨精 还有其他颜色的骨精

translation.en: We could sing songs about you, and I'll give you a grand speech.
translation.zh:
我们可以歌颂你
我为你做个盛大的演讲

-然后呢？
-用你的名字命名一条街？

translation.en: Oh, oh, oh, oh, a big, fat shiny medal of solid brass.
translation.zh: 一大块闪亮的实心铜章

translation.en: Ooh, that will impress 'em. Okay. Next up. What's in it for my trusty companion?
translation.zh:
那能让他们开开眼 好 然后呢
我的同伴有啥好处？

-这个女孩？
-不！我神奇的金箍棒

translation.en: -What's in it for him? -Um, what does it want?
translation.zh:
他有什么好处？ -它想要什么？
-你想要什么？

translation.en: What do you want? A guitar.
translation.zh:
-它想要什么？
-你想要什么？ 一把吉他

translation.en: But your stick can't play the guitar.
translation.zh: 但你的金箍棒弹不了吉他

translation.en: -[Mayor's wife] Uh-oh. -The fire beast is outside.
Please don't let it hurt my innocent little child!
translation.zh: 请别让它伤害我无辜的小孩！

translation.en: The quicker I slay this fire demon, the faster we get to celebrate me.
translation.zh:
我越快杀了这个喷火怪
我们就能越早开始庆祝我的胜利

translation.en: [fire demon] Silence or I shall devour you!
translation.zh: 安静 不然我就吃了你！
喂 我看到你了 妖怪

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Joining the Immortal Ones, duh.
translation.zh:
-你在做什么？
-加入众仙 这还用说

translation.en: Daddy! The demon was so mean!
We had to find a hero.
translation.zh: 我们得先找到一个英雄

translation.en: -You're the worst daddy ever. -[Mayor] Now, son, don't hit Daddy.
translation.zh:
-你是最糟糕的爸爸
-好了 儿子 别打爸爸

translation.en: How dare you challenge Red Girl, Monkey King?
translation.zh: 你竟敢挑衅红孩儿 美猴王！

translation.en: [distorted] Quake in my presence and bow to my awesome power!
translation.zh: 颤抖吧 臣服于我的威力吧！

translation.en: Hey, Red Girl, leave these poor, unattractive people alone.
translation.zh:
嘿 红孩儿
放过这些贫穷又不好看的人吧

translation.en: But the kids are ripest this time of year.
translation.zh: 但现在这个季节 小孩最甜美多汁了

translation.en: Okay, Monkey King, what's the play? Are you gonna--
translation.zh: 美猴王 有什么计划？你要…

translation.en: Okay, little girl. I can take it from here.
translation.zh: 好了 小姑娘 交给我吧

translation.en: -[Monkey King grunts] -[Red Girl] Hey, cut that out!
Hey, you're a little scrawny for number 100, but we'll make it work.
translation.zh:
你作为第一百个妖怪有点太瘦了
但也可以吧

translation.en: -[Monkey King] Like I care! -[Red Girl snarls]
Don't give up now. Ha! You're doing great.
translation.zh: 别放弃 你做得很好

translation.en: Congratulations! The Monkey King's last victim.
translation.zh: 恭喜你！美猴王最后的猎物！

translation.en: -You're gonna be famous. Ow! -[Red Girl yelps]
That Monkey's gonna burn down the whole village.
translation.zh: 那猴子会烧了整个村子

translation.en: Do you really think you can defeat me?
translation.zh: 你真以为你能打败我吗？

translation.en: And for the beef dish, sire,

translation.zh: 是做生菜包肉还是烤串？

translation.en: Where did you get that stick?
Good idea, Stick. Hey, you want it?
translation.zh: 好主意 金箍棒 嘿 你想要吗？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah! Gimme, gimme, gimme!
If you can hold it for ten seconds, it's yours.
translation.zh: 如果你能抓牢十秒 这就是你的了

translation.en: -[Monkey King] Four… Eight… -[Red Girl] One… Two…
-Monkey King reigns supreme! -[Stick protests] And Stick.
translation.zh: 美猴王所向披靡！还有金箍棒

translation.en: Incredible. You got her to fall right into your trap.
translation.zh: 难以置信 她直接落入了你的陷阱

translation.en: -I will learn so much from you. -[groans] You're still here?
translation.zh: 我能从你身上学到很多 你还在啊？

translation.en: I am but a lowly peasant girl from a tiny village
translation.zh: 我是小村子来的一个卑微农民

translation.en: who hopes to make a difference someday.
I offer my skills as your humble assistant and weapon-bearer.
translation.zh: 我愿意做你的助手 帮你拿武器

translation.en: So, you got my big victory speech ready, right?
translation.zh: 所以 你为我准备了胜利演讲 对吧？

translation.en: Well, then, grab yourself a scroll and take notes because it's,
translation.zh: 那就拿个卷轴来做笔记 因为…
“我们这些无知的村民何其有幸…

translation.en: the mighty Monkey King's heavenly ascension
translation.zh: 见证伟大的美猴王加入众仙的

translation.en: "He is the bravest, most spectac… spectac…"
"Music and lyrics by a handsome artist who, um, wishes to remain anonymous."
translation.zh:
“由一位不愿透露姓名的英俊艺术家
作词作曲”

translation.en: ♪ Who's the handsome hero We all love and adore? ♪
translation.zh: 谁是人见人爱的帅气英雄？

translation.en: ♪ Who has demons screaming When he knocks on their door? ♪
translation.zh: 谁让妖魔鬼怪闻风丧胆？

translation.en: ♪ Who's the simian you'll find shimmying Up to the top ♪
translation.zh: 谁是轻轻一跃就冲上云霄

translation.en: ♪ And you know he won't stop Till he's won? ♪
translation.zh: 不打败对手不罢休的猴？

translation.en: ♪ That's right, it's the Monkey King! ♪
Eh, you were a little flat. Ya!
[Dragon King] Hm. It appears the ape didn't succumb to our fiery little minx as I'd hoped.
translation.zh:
看来这猴没像我想象中那样
被暴躁的疯丫头制服

translation.en: Are you sufficiently moisturized, Your Grace?
translation.zh: 你滋润够了吗 殿下？

translation.en: You know what happens in the dry night air.
translation.zh: 你知道在干燥的夜空中会发生什么

translation.en: So, where are the Immortal Ones?
-Yeah, we were promised gods! -They're coming. Move.
translation.zh:
-是啊 说好了神仙会来的
-他们来了 走开
哇 真是了不起的成就

translation.en: The Immortal Ones can welcome me with open arms now.
translation.zh: 众仙可以张开双手欢迎我了
现在？喂？这玩意儿开了吗？
他们来了！快看 农民！

translation.en: You are no hero! You're a thief!
Aw, you're not the Immortal Ones.
-What's wrong, Stick? You know this chump? -[Stick groans]
translation.zh: 怎么了 金箍棒？你认识这傻子？

translation.en: Stick? You never talked to me.
translation.zh: 金箍棒？你从没跟我说过话

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, hey. Who are you anyway?
I am the undersea ruler of the--
Don't look at me! No, no, no. Be right back.
translation.zh: 别看我！不 马上回来

translation.en: -…undersea ruler of the dragon kingdom. -What? Come on.
translation.zh:
-龙之帝国的海底统治者
-什么？拜托

translation.en: And you, sir, stole my stick.
translation.zh: 而你 先生 偷了我的金箍棒

translation.en: No, I didn't. I found it at the bottom of the ocean.
translation.zh: 我没有 我在海底捡到的

translation.en: Right in the middle of some tacky palace.
Tacky? Once I reclaim my stick,
translation.zh: 俗气？一旦我夺回我的金箍棒

translation.en: you and all these air-breathers will suffer my… my…
translation.zh: 你和这些吸空气的都将承受我的…
干燥气候 不 别看！

translation.en: There's supposed to be a lightning crash. And there it is. [laughs]
translation.zh: 应该有道闪电的 就在这儿

translation.en: Hey, Babbo, how will we know when we're under the stick?
translation.zh:
嘿 八保
我们怎么知道到金箍棒底下了？

translation.en: Easy. The stick will be right above us.
translation.zh: 简单 金箍棒会在我们上面

translation.en: How will we know we took the right stick?
translation.zh: 我们怎么确定拿了正确的棍子？

translation.en: But what if we choose wrong, Babbo?
translation.zh: 但如果我们选错了呢 八保？

translation.en: Who even wears brass with gold?
Look, buddy, I hear ya. You love my stick. Everyone loves the stick.
translation.zh:
伙计 我知道 你喜欢我的金箍棒
大家都喜欢金箍棒

translation.en: But no one appreciates the stick like I do.
translation.zh: 但没人比我更能欣赏金箍棒

translation.en: -[Stick murmurs urgently] -Quiet! The grown-ups are talking.
translation.zh: 安静 金箍棒 大人们在说话呢

translation.en: And now you're ruining my exclusive ceremony.
translation.zh: 现在你毁了我的专有仪式

translation.en: Point is, Stick is not going anywhere.
translation.zh: 重点是 金箍棒哪儿都不会去
对不对 金箍棒？ 兄弟？

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -Stick, stay strong! I'm coming!
translation.zh: 金箍棒 坚强点！我来了！
金箍棒 亲爱的 我是龙

translation.en: He only listens to me, flaky.
I don't see a ring on it, honey! [grunts]
-Hit the brake! -[Monkey King] Fun ride, huh?
Ha ha! Monkey King reigns supreme!
Fear not, little girl. The villain is gone.
translation.zh: 别怕 小姑娘 坏人跑掉了

translation.en: Maybe you're not as useless as I thought.
translation.zh: 也许你没我想的那么没用

translation.en: Twenty minutes, and still no invite from the Jade Emperor.
translation.zh: 20分钟了 还没收到玉帝的邀请

translation.en: Immortality! Of course. It's right in the name.
translation.zh: 永生吗？当然了 不死才能做神仙

translation.en: To become an Immortal One, I need immortality!
translation.zh: 要成为神仙 我需要不死之身！

translation.en: Okay, look, kid. You see this?
translation.zh: 好了 孩子 你看到没？

translation.en: No! I mean, yes. But no. This here is me.
translation.zh: 不！没错 但不是这个意思 这是我

translation.en: And this tiny thing is you.
and you're an insignificant, useless pebble.
translation.zh: 而你是这个微不足道的没用的小石子

translation.en: Even a tiny pebble can make a big ripple, you know.
translation.zh: 就算是小石子也能激起千层浪

translation.en: [scoffs] That's just what a tiny pebble would say.
So, Stick, immortality, where do we go?
translation.zh: 好了 金箍棒 得到永生要去哪里？

translation.en: -But how do we get there? -[Stick hums]
That's grass. That's the sky. That's a rock. See? Reading.
translation.zh:
那是草 那是天空
那是石头 看到了吗？正在阅读

translation.en: -[Stick hums] -No, no, no, no, no. We don't need her.
-He wants me to come. Doesn't he? -Just go home, kid.
translation.zh:
-他想要我来 是不是？
-回家吧 孩子

translation.en: I can't go home. There's trouble back there,
translation.zh: 我不能回家 那里有麻烦

translation.en: and it made me do some things.
translation.zh: 逼我做了一些我不该做的事

translation.en: -Things I probably shouldn't have done. -Ooh! You killed someone?
translation.zh:
逼我做了一些我不该做的事 -你杀了人？
-没有！

translation.en: I just wanna do big things someday. Like you.
translation.zh: 我总着能做大事 像你一样

translation.en: -I know. No. I-- -[Stick murmurs] -Yes, but-- -[Stick murmurs]
translation.zh: 我知道 不 我… 没错 但是…

translation.en: How much reading could we possibly need?
So, assistant girl, you coming or what?
translation.zh: 助理女孩 你要来吗？

translation.en: This. It's like an all-access VIP pass.
translation.zh: 这个 这就像是贵宾通行证

translation.en: Any realm, any dimension. Even the Land of the Dead.
translation.zh:
任何地方 任何维度
就连死人的国度都能进

translation.en: And if all goes well, never will be.
translation.zh: 如果一切顺利 就永远不会死了

translation.en: Okay. If we're gonna fit in, we gotta dress the part.
translation.zh: 好 要融入的话就得打扮一下

translation.en: Are we even supposed to be here?
See, the day you're supposed to die
translation.zh: 看 你命里该死的那一天

translation.en: is recorded in the Scroll of Life and Death.
But if my name should somehow get crossed out,
translation.zh: 但如果我的名字被划掉了

translation.en: then no death registered, and guess who's immortal?
translation.zh: 没有死亡登记 猜猜谁永生了？

translation.en: One more thing. Die in hell, stay in hell. So don't die.
translation.zh:
还有一件事
死在地府就留在地府了 所以别死

translation.en: Oh yeah. Great. You're giving me chills.
translation.zh: 很好 吓得我发抖了

translation.en: You brought a live chicken to the underworld?
translation.zh: 你把一只活鸡带到了冥府？

translation.en: That's better. Pit of Infinite Agony. Fourth floor on your right. Next!
translation.zh:
好多了 无限痛苦地狱
右边第四层 下一个！

translation.en: I'd like a quick glance at the Life and Death Scrolls.
-Release form. -Back to the world of the living.
-As my assistant, your first duty… -[Lin groans]
translation.zh: 作为我的助理 你的第一个任务

translation.en: -What are you doing? -She's alive? Here in hell?
And you cut in front of all these people?
-Oh, Monkey! -[Monkey cackles] Uh, uh, I… I'm not…
I couldn't be more dead. Fresh corpse here.
translation.zh: 我死透了 这是新鲜的尸体

translation.en: Old age. No, I mean scurvy. Earthquake?
translation.zh: 老死的 不 我是说坏血病 地震？

translation.en: I fell… off a cliff into a hole filled with sharks.
translation.zh: 我从悬崖上掉进一个满是鲨鱼的洞里

translation.en: And then a house fell on me,
translation.zh: 然后一栋房子掉在我身上

translation.en: Monkey! You abandoned me in the middle of hell.
translation.zh: 猴子！你在地府抛弃了我

translation.en: You don't leave a teammate behind.
What teammate? You're an assistant. An insignificant pebble.
translation.zh:
队友？ 你是助理
微不足道的小石子

translation.en: As soon as you find my scroll so I can cross my name off. Come on.
translation.zh:
只要你能找到我的卷轴
让我把名字划掉 走吧

translation.en: What's your family name? Don't have one. I was born from a rock.
translation.zh:
-你姓什么？
-没姓 我是石头里蹦出来的

translation.en: More of a rock egg. The scrolls list your family history.
translation.zh:
更像是个石头蛋
卷轴上列着家族史
我一定有父母 对吧？

translation.en: My scroll? Why does he have my scroll?
translation.zh: 我的卷轴？他为什么会有我的卷轴？
你不属于这里 闯入者

translation.en: Oh ho! Time to defeat demon 101.
-[clone 1] Don't let them get away! -[clone 2] Capture them!
-Wait! Time-out. I'm not a part of this. -Nobody's on the bench!
translation.zh:
-等等！暂停 这跟我没关系
-没人能旁观！

translation.en: Monkey, I got 'em. This one's mine. Huh?
translation.zh: 猴子 我拿到了 这是我的

translation.en: What's it say about my family? [yells]
-Give me that scroll. -Third line from the bottom.
Step away from the scroll, you flea-bitten, mortal lowlife! Close!
translation.zh:
离卷轴远一点
你个被跳蚤咬的低贱烦人！关！

translation.en: Even for hell, this is bad.
translation.zh: 对地府来说这也很糟糕

translation.en: What's up, Yama? Or should I say, what's down? [laughs]
translation.zh:
怎么了 阎王？
我是不是该说 下面怎么了？

translation.en: I beseech you. A rogue primate has invaded hell and-- Ow!
translation.zh:
我恳求你的帮助
 一个无赖的灵长类动物入侵地府…

translation.en: Hey, uh, Jade Emperor, right? Listen, great news.
translation.zh: 嘿 是玉皇大帝吧？ 好消息

translation.en: Get the Immortal Ones together. I'm on my way. We're gonna be neighbors.
translation.zh:
召集仙人
我在路上了 我们要做邻居了

-你就是美猴王
-要在你的宴会大吃大喝了

translation.en: -We're gonna share battle stories. -Please. You're not one of us.
translation.zh:
-我们可以分享战斗故事
-拜托 我们不是一路人

translation.en: Actually, I am. Crossed my name out and everything.
translation.zh: 我们是 我把名字都划掉了

translation.en: But you can still die in battle.
Don't look at me. This was your plan.
translation.zh: 别看我 这是你的计划

translation.en: So, how exactly does one get full immortality?
Well, there is The Book of Everlasting Life, my lord.
translation.zh: 有一本《永生秘籍》 玉帝大人

translation.en: -You shut your beard hole right now! -My bad.
translation.zh:
-你现在就把胡子洞关上！
-我错了
助理 秘籍！猴子 一定要帅

translation.en: Whatever you do, don't let him leave with that book!
translation.zh: 不管怎样 别让他拿到那本秘籍！

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no, no, no! Monkey!
Ha! Well, that was fun. You got the book?
translation.zh: 真好玩 你拿到秘籍了吗？

translation.en: -Uh, um, uh… -You didn't lose it, did you?
One job and you blew it!
-Just messing with you! -Do you treat all your friends like this?
translation.zh:
-逗你玩的
-你就这样对你朋友？

translation.en: Friends? Whoa, okay. You're more like a teammate on my very critical mission.
translation.zh:
“朋友”？
你更像是重要任务的一个队友

translation.en: Well, that's better than a pebble.
All right. Moving on. See this?
translation.zh: 好了 继续 看到了吗？

translation.en: This book can tell us how I can get my full immortality.
translation.zh: 这本秘籍能告诉我们如何得到永生

-上面写了什么？
-好吧 上面写…

translation.en: Oh. "Full immortality can be attained by eating a magical peach
from the Enchanted Orchard of Everlasting Life."
translation.zh: 吃蟠桃园的桃子而得到”

translation.en: And I will give you five minutes.
He gets in fights, insults the gods.
translation.zh: 他乱打架 侮辱众神

translation.en: He just stole a book from hell! Oh yeah, did I mention? We went to hell!
translation.zh:
他从地府偷了本书！
对了 我有提到吗？我们下地狱了！

translation.en: Okay, let's bring the sass down to, like, a four, okay, sweetheart?
translation.zh:
好了 甜心
我们说话别这么冲 行吗？

translation.en: I can't keep this up. I can't do this.
translation.zh: 我坚持不了了 我做不到

translation.en: Listen, honey, we made a deal.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我们说好了

translation.en: Could you please grace us with a rainstorm?
translation.zh: 可以请你给我们一场暴雨吗？
我们等好久了！ 什么？
为什么通缉令海报没用？

translation.en: But we put them up everywhere, Your Grace. There's one.
translation.zh:
但我们到处张贴了 殿下
那里就有一张

translation.en: I told you to draw the monkey, you dimwit!
translation.zh: 我让你画猴子 笨蛋！

translation.en: But, sire, monkeys are so much harder to draw than sticks.
translation.zh: 但是 殿下 猴子比棍子难画多了

translation.en: [gasps] Divine Master of Weather. Thank you for answering my call.
translation.zh:
尊敬的龙王陛下
谢谢你回应我的呼唤

translation.en: How dare you, a mere mortal, speak to his lordship.
translation.zh:
你这小小的凡人
怎敢对龙王大人说话

translation.en: We have no food here. No water.
translation.zh: 我们这里没有食物 没有水

translation.en: Could you please, please send us rain?
Well, aren't you a presumptuous little snack.
translation.zh: 你真是个放肆的小屁孩

translation.en: I'll do anything. You must need something. An assistant. A servant.
translation.zh:
我什么都愿意做 你一定有需要
助理 仆人

translation.en: He already has two perfectly good and trusted advisors.
translation.zh: 他已经有两位非常可靠的顾问

translation.en: [laughs] No! No. But perhaps our monkey would.
translation.zh: 不 但也许我们的猴子需要

translation.en: Would you lie for me? Get your paws dirty?
translation.zh: 你会为我撒谎吗？做脏事？

translation.en: You'll have to be manipulative, vicious, and cunning.
translation.zh: 你得有心机 恶毒 狡猾

translation.en: Do you have that in you, you scrumptious, sweet little thing?
translation.zh: 你可以吗 可口的小甜甜？

translation.en: Because when you make a deal with me, you follow through or…
translation.zh: 因为当你和我做交易 就得做到底 不然…
等待你的就是干裂的嘴唇！

translation.en: Befriend a certain monkey, earn his trust, and take his stick.
translation.zh:
跟某只猴子交朋友 赢得他的信任
偷走他的金箍棒

translation.en: He never lets the stick out of his sight.
translation.zh: 他从不让金箍棒离开他的视线

translation.en: The sooner it's in my grip,
the faster you'll get your drip, drip, drip.
Well, now he's got me searching this stolen book
translation.zh: 现在他让我在这本偷来的书里

translation.en: for some Orchard of Everlasting Life.
He's still trying to join the Immortal Ones? [laughs]
Hm. He wants an enchanted peach now, does he?
translation.zh: 他现在想要蟠桃 对吧？

translation.en: Oh, well, I'll just have to put on a little show and give him one. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我们就演场戏 给他一个桃子

translation.en: All you need to worry about is getting him there.
translation.zh: 你只要让他到那里就行

translation.en: You sure this is the right way to get to that fancy peach orchard?
translation.zh: 你确定这是去蟠桃园的路？

translation.en: -[Monkey King grunts] Woo-hoo! -[Lin] Do you have to go top speed?
-I'll show you top speed. -No, no, no. I--
translation.zh:
-我给你看看最快速度
-不 我…

translation.en: Now, any personal assistant of mine really needs to be in the moment.
translation.zh: 我的私人助理必须沉浸在当下

translation.en: You need to be more focused and pay better attention.
translation.zh: 你要集中注意一 更有觉察力

translation.en: I need to know you'll always have my back.
translation.zh: 我得知道 你会一直支持我

translation.en: He's coming back. He's coming back.
[Monkey King] And my shoes perfectly shined.
It's the attention to detail that I value most.
translation.zh: 我最看重的是对细节的关注

translation.en: Where to next? The hills? The desert?
translation.zh: 下一站去哪里？山丘？沙漠？

translation.en: I could've died peacefully in my village, but, no!
translation.zh: 我本可以在我的村子平静地死去

translation.en: Chamber of Ridiculous Deaths, here I come.
translation.zh: 离奇死亡倒霉鬼地狱 我来了

translation.en: ♪ Who's the handsome hero We love and adore? ♪
translation.zh: 谁是人见人爱的帅气英雄

translation.en: Oh, there you are. Did you hear any of my performance evaluation?
translation.zh: 你来了 你有没有听到我给你的绩效评估？

translation.en: If you're gonna be critical, be fair.
translation.zh: 如果你要批评我 公平一点
给我嗡嗡嗡 八保 嗡嗡嗡！

translation.en: -I'm adorable! -All right, Benbo, less is more.
translation.zh: 我很可爱！ 八保 别演过了

translation.en: Does this look like an enchanted peach garden?
translation.zh: 这看起来像真正的蟠桃园吗？

translation.en: If you believe it, so will your audience. Here are the new sides.
translation.zh:
如果你相信 你的观众也会相信
这是新台词

translation.en: Try not to step on each other's lines. Keep the scene contained.
translation.zh: 别抢彼此的台词 把现场控制住

translation.en: I only had time to poison one tree.
translation.zh: 我只有时间给一棵树下毒

translation.en: The toxin should take only a few moments to knock him out cold.
translation.zh: 毒只需要几分钟就能让他毙命

translation.en: Remember, the tree in the light has the peach he should bite.
translation.zh: 记住 灯光下的树上有他该咬的桃子

translation.en: If it's hidden by night, then the fruit isn't right. Got it?
translation.zh:
若是藏在夜幕里
就不是正确的果子 懂了吗？

translation.en: Okay. If the tree is in light, then, um, uh…
-It's the peach he should bite. -Oh yeah. So definitely not that tree.
translation.zh:
-…有他该咬的桃子
-对 绝对不是那棵树

translation.en: But that tree's not white. It's more of a brown.
translation.zh:
但那棵树不是白色的
更像是棕色的

translation.en: I lit it up for you. See?
translation.zh: 我为你点亮 看见没？

translation.en: And once the monkey passes out, I'll grab the stick and--
translation.zh: 等猴子晕过去 我会拿走金箍棒…

translation.en: Everybody back to one. Hit your marks. And let's have some fun out there.
translation.zh:
大家都回到原点 站在标记上
玩得开心

translation.en: Ugh. This peach grove looks kinda shabby. Are you sure this is--
translation.zh:
这个桃园看起来有点破旧
你确定这…

translation.en: Oh yeah. One bite of the magical fruit, and you get full immortality.
translation.zh:
对 只要咬一口桃子
你就能长生不老了

translation.en: ♪ It's the Orchard of Everlasting Life ♪
♪ And the pollinators Of this magic orchard ♪
I don't know why, but I like these guys.
translation.zh: 我说不出为啥 但我喜欢他们

translation.en: ♪ Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha! Handsome, hairy stranger ♪
translation.zh: 帅气的毛茸茸的陌生人

translation.en: ♪ I mean, the peaches that are juiciest Are in that glowing tree ♪
translation.zh:
我是说
最多汁的桃子在那颗发光的树上
我没有什么特别的感觉

translation.en: -Hm, well-- -Or maybe it's the tree over here.
That's ridiculous. The one in the light has the juiciest--
translation.zh:
太荒谬了
灯光下的树上有最多汁…

translation.en: Maybe it's this tree. The one in the dark. That's the most delicious.
translation.zh:
也许是黑暗中的这棵树上
有最美味的

translation.en: Nope. Definitely not as juicy as the one--
translation.zh: 不 绝对没有那棵树上的多汁…

translation.en: Uh, what's wrong with this one?
No, no, no, no. This is definitely the right tree.
translation.zh: 不 这肯定是对的树

translation.en: -[Monkey King] You eat it. -Come on. Just eat it. Yum.
translation.zh:
-你吃 不
-来 吃吧 好吃

translation.en: How about at the same time?

translation.zh: 好吧 长生不老 我来了

translation.en: Maybe you should just sit down.
Hey! Buzz off, lady, and mind your own…
translation.zh: 喂！滚开 女士 管好自己的…

translation.en: Clear the stage. I'll take that stick. Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 下台吧 我来了 金箍棒 非常感谢

translation.en: Oh, your skin's all cleared up. You are gorgy!
translation.zh: 你的皮肤很干净！你好美！

translation.en: You must be from the Dang Dynasty!
Hey, hey, you gotta try these peaches, man.
translation.zh: 嘿 你得尝尝这些桃子

translation.en: Don't you realize what's in those

translation.zh: 美味 令人垂涎欲滴的…

translation.en: Who wants to take a bath with me?
[Monkey King] We're hot-tubbing with the dragon!
But the two of you are my best friends.
translation.zh: 但你们两个是我最好的朋友

translation.en: No. No, no, no, no. We're not friends.
The three of us, we're family.
Did the peaches work? Am I fully immortal now?
translation.zh:
桃子有用吗？
我现在长生不老了吗？

translation.en: Take my stick and whack me in the face. It's all right. Come on, come on. Do it.
translation.zh: 拿金箍棒打我的脸 没关系 来吧

translation.en: -[groans] Fine. I'll do it myself, wuss. -[Lin snarls]
translation.zh: 好吧 我自己来 懦夫

translation.en: -Those peaches were defective. -Maybe they're out of season.
translation.zh:
那些桃子有问题 -也许过季了
-什么？我们的任务失败了 金箍棒

translation.en: -What? Our quest has failed, Stick. -[Stick groans]
translation.zh:
-也许过季了
-什么？我们的任务失败了 金箍棒

translation.en: This old geezer once told me all the things I couldn't do.
translation.zh: 有个老头曾告诉我 我做不成很多事

translation.en: I heard that all the time back home. [sighs]
-I mean, it was mostly me. -You're leaving?
-It was nice knowing you, little girl. -But no!
translation.zh:
-很高兴认识你 小姑娘
-不！

translation.en: [grunts] Don't go. You said we were family.
translation.zh: 别走 你说我们是一家人

translation.en: -No, I didn't. -You did. Doesn't sound like me.
translation.zh:
-我没有 听起来不像我说的话
-你说了

translation.en: -Well, you said it. -That was just the peaches talking.
But you promised we'd do big things. We can't give up now.
translation.zh:
但是你答应过我要做大事
我们不能放弃

translation.en: I'm still gonna join the Immortal Ones. -Just not with you. -[Lin groans]
translation.zh: 我还是要加入众仙行列 不和你一起

translation.en: You know what? I'm starting to think that wasn't even the real peach orchard.
translation.zh:
你知道吗？
我开始怀疑那不是真正的蟠桃园

translation.en: You think I… I deliberately brought you to the wrong place?
translation.zh: 你觉得我是故意带你走错地方？

translation.en: L-L-Like some sort of… Like some sort of trap?
You're saying I lied to you?
You know what? Go ahead. Walk away. You're so selfish.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？走吧 你太自私了

translation.en: -Well, no one else will. -Ugh! 'Cause you won't let them.
translation.zh:
-其他人都不会在乎
-因为你不给他们机会

translation.en: Someday, you really will end up all alone.
translation.zh: 总有一天 你会孤身一人

translation.en: -What are you yapping on about? -[Stick murmurs]
Who's that? Assistant, what does it say?
translation.zh: 那是谁？助理 上面写了什么？

translation.en: "An authority on everlasting life, the royal sorceress, Wangmu,
translation.zh: “长生不老的权威 皇家法师王母

translation.en: can often be found in her laboratory brewing her famous Elixir of Immortality."
translation.zh: 经常在她的实验室调配长生不老药”

translation.en: We're back in the game! One sip and they'll have to accept me.
translation.zh: 有戏了！喝一口 他们就得接受我

translation.en: You too, Pebble. What are we waiting for?
translation.zh: 你也是 小石子 我们还等什么？

translation.en: -But that's in heaven. -Monkey King reigns supreme!
translation.zh:
-但那是在天庭
-美猴王所向披靡
她在那儿 王母娘娘 天庭的皇后
王母娘娘 天庭的皇后

translation.en: Yeah, whatever. Let's go make me immortal.
translation.zh: 随便吧 我们去给我拿到永生药吧

translation.en: Somewhere in this room are the ingredients for making the Elixir of Immortality.
translation.zh: 这房间里肯定有长生不老药的配料

translation.en: -Guess I'll just have to taste everything. -No. No. Wait.
translation.zh:
-看来我得尝尝一切了
-不 等等

translation.en: -First thing we need is-- -Here goes nothing.
translation.zh:
-我们首先需要的是…
-啥也没有

translation.en: -I'm just smelling it. -[Lin] Don't smell anything.

translation.zh: 好吧 小琳 你可以的

translation.en: Don't look back. Don't look back. Don't… look… back.
Aw, you're just a scared little monkey.
translation.zh: 你只是一只害怕的小猴子
没有朋友 没有家人

translation.en: My people are counting on me.
-Oh! Agh! -Gee, why'd you trash this place?
translation.zh: 天啊！你为什么要把这里搞成这样？
我们是客人 放尊重点

translation.en: Show a little respect. Immortality Elixir?
translation.zh:
我们是客人 放尊重点 长生不老药呢？拜托
我给你钱不是让你胡闹的

translation.en: Hello? Come on. I'm not paying you to goof around.
translation.zh:
长生不老药呢？拜托
我给你钱不是让你胡闹的

translation.en: -We're not actually paying her, are we? -[Stick hums]
translation.zh: 我们不是真的要付她钱吧？

translation.en: There. A pinch of instant karma.
translation.zh: 这里 一小撮即刻报应

translation.en: -Get mixing. -[woman] Stealing from an old lady?
Don't worry, kid. I'll take care of her.
translation.zh: 别担心 我来搞定她

translation.en: A spoonful of chi. There! The blue jar.
translation.zh: 一勺气 在那里！蓝色的罐子里

translation.en: A spoonful of chi coming up.
-[Monkey King] What's next? -A drop of moon essence. The green jar.
translation.zh:
-还有什么？
-一滴月亮精华 -绿色的罐子
-坏猴子！

-绿色的罐子
-坏猴子！ 在做了

translation.en: -Here you go. -[Wangmu] This is going to sting!
You call yourself a god? I'm so disappointed. What a bummer.
translation.zh: 你自称神？我太失望了 扫兴

translation.en: Um, it's stuck! I-I need a spoon or chopsticks or--
translation.zh: 卡住了！我需要勺子 筷子 或…

translation.en: Your friend's not here to protect you now. [laughs]
translation.zh: 你朋友现在没法保护你了

translation.en: Uh, we're not friends. I'm his assistant.
translation.zh: 我们不是朋友 我是他的助理
我是为了他的金箍棒来的

translation.en: I need it to save my village from a drought.
translation.zh: 我需要它来拯救我遭遇旱灾的村子

translation.en: So, the thief's assistant is also a thief. [laughs]
Take his stick and go! The Jade Emperor will see you home.
translation.zh:
拿着他的棍子滚吧！
玉帝会送你回家的

translation.en: What are you going to do to him?
That selfish creature doesn't care about you.
translation.zh: 那个自私的家伙根本不在乎你

translation.en: Ha ha! Stick, where are you?

translation.zh:
-回来受虐了 猴子？
-糟糕 不要回头

translation.en: Don't look back! Don't look back.
You couldn't possibly think you were worthy to take your place here
translation.zh: 你不会认为你有资格在我们仙界

translation.en: I love it when people tell me what I can't do.
translation.zh: 我最喜欢听别人说我不能做什么了

translation.en: You will never be one of us!

translation.zh:
-我已经来了！
-他们来了！我们得离开这里！

translation.en: -We gotta get out of here! -What are they gonna do? I can't die.
translation.zh:
-我已经来了！
-他们来了！我们得离开这里！ 他们能怎么样？我死不了

translation.en: There are fates far worse than death.
translation.zh: 有远比死亡更可怕的命运

translation.en: Bring 'em on! I am a god.
He's coming. He's coming. He's coming.
-What's your deal? -You came back for me!
I so could've beaten that old lady.
translation.zh: 我本可以打败那个老太太

-但你没有 因为你在乎
-不

translation.en: He was all like, "We're not family. You're a tiny pebble."
translation.zh:
他表现出
“我们不是家人 你是个小石子”

translation.en: Are you two done? 'Cause I got to get to the Jade Palace.
translation.zh: 你俩说完了吗？我要去天宫了

translation.en: -To do what? -Defeat all the Immortal Ones.
Then I'll become their ruler, the new king of heaven.
translation.zh:
然后我会成为他们的统治者
天庭的新王

translation.en: Wait. Are you sure? Sounds kinda crazy.
translation.zh: 等等 你确定吗？听起来有点疯狂

translation.en: Yep! Whatever the Monkey King does, he does big!
translation.zh: 对 美猴王做什么都是惊天动地！

translation.en: -And you won't ever stop? -Not until the day I die.
translation.zh:
-你不会停下来吗？
-除非我死了

translation.en: My thirst for new challenges will never end.
translation.zh: 我对新挑战的渴望永远不会结束

translation.en: I'll never be satisfied. I'll never be fulfilled.
translation.zh: 我永远不会满足 永远不会知足

translation.en: Which, when I say it out loud, sounds incredibly depressing.
translation.zh: 我一说出口就感觉非常可悲

translation.en: Wow! Did I just curse myself?
translation.zh: 哇！我是不是诅咒了自己？

translation.en: Maybe defeating everyone isn't always the answer.
translation.zh: 也许打败所有人不是答案
也许你可以通过帮助别人

translation.en: I don't know, helping other people?
-That could be your new, uh, path. -Hm.
Say you could save a starving village by lending out the stick for--
translation.zh:
假设你把金箍棒借出去
拯救受灾的村庄…

translation.en: Okay. How about I rip off my tail and give that away too? I mean, come on.
translation.zh: 我的金箍棒？好吧 不如我把尾巴扯下来送人？摆脱

translation.en: You could save the lives of so many.
translation.zh: 你可以救很多人的性命

translation.en: Me and Stick are meant for way bigger things.
translation.zh: 我和金箍棒有更重要的使命

translation.en: You wanna be happy, you help people.
translation.zh: 你想要幸福 就去帮助别人

translation.en: You're the only mortal I know who's gone to hell and heaven in one day.
translation.zh:
你是我认识的唯一在一天内
闯入天庭和地府的凡人

translation.en: That wasn't my accomplishment. That was you.
translation.zh: 那不是我的成就 是你的

translation.en: When we were in hell, I read my scroll.
translation.zh: 我们在地府的时候 我读了我的卷轴
上面写着“小琳 普通的农家女孩”

translation.en: "Tried to make a difference. Never did."
translation.zh: “希望有所作为 从来没有”

translation.en: [sighs] Does it have to end that way?

translation.zh: 我不知道 谁是小琳？

translation.en: Oh! Hey, Lin. Monkey King. Nice to meet ya.
translation.zh: 哦！小琳 我是美猴王 幸会

translation.en: Buck up, Lin. No one thought I could make a difference, right?
translation.zh:
振作点 小琳
没人觉得我能有所作为 对吧？

translation.en: But now look at me. The original outsider.
translation.zh: 看看我 原创的野猴子
上帝 妖怪 老猴子

translation.en: challenge you or stand in your way.
translation.zh: 挑战你 拦住你的路

translation.en: How long do you think an immortal monkey can hold his breath under that water?
translation.zh:
你觉得长生不老的猴子
在水里憋气多久？

translation.en: Don't be sad. You've done good, girl.
translation.zh: 别难过 你做得很好 姑娘

translation.en: Go home. Your storm is coming.
translation.zh: 回家吧 暴雨要来了

translation.en: Ah, I wasn't gonna make you wait the whole three.
Forget it. Come on. Grab Stick, and we'll--
translation.zh: 算了 来吧 拿上金箍棒 我们…

translation.en: -He just needs to borrow it. -Borrow it?
-Where did you get that? -The Dragon King just--
The Dragon King can help them.
I trusted you, Lin. I saved you.
translation.zh: 我信任你 小琳 我救了你

translation.en: I saved you first. And I asked for your help.
translation.zh: 我先救了你 然后我请你帮忙

translation.en: You said if I want something, don't ask. Just take it.
translation.zh:
你说过 如果我想要什么
别问 尽管拿

translation.en: Stickipoo here had a momentary fling,
In fact, he'll be the guest of honor at my celebration tonight.
translation.zh: 他是我今夜庆典的特别嘉宾

translation.en: And a warm thanks to you for the help, my child.
translation.zh: 感谢你的帮助 我的孩子

translation.en: Tell your village the drought is over.
translation.zh: 告诉你的村庄 旱季结束了

translation.en: For you, your people, and the entire world!
translation.zh: 对你 你的村民 还有全世界！

translation.en: No, we have to stop him.
translation.zh: 不行 我们必须阻止他

translation.en: -We're still family, right? -I have no family.
translation.zh:
-我们还是一家人 是吧？
-我没有家人

translation.en: -I'll help you get Stick back. -Help me?

translation.zh: 我让你看看什么是疯狂

translation.en: Oh, Wangmu, if you can't stop a little monkey from smashing your roof--
translation.zh:
王母 如果你阻止不了小猴子
掀翻你的屋顶…

translation.en: [Benbo] To finally kick off his world domination tour…
translation.zh: 终于开始了他统治世界的旅程…

translation.en: [Benbo] Put your fins and tentacles together for…
translation.zh: 伸出你们的鱼鳍和触手 掌声有请…

translation.en: ♪ Feeling weary, well, you oughta 'Cause dwelling underwater isn't swell ♪
translation.zh:
感觉疲惫不堪 很正常
在水底生活并不愉悦

translation.en: ♪ You see, since birth I have fought a dermatology disorder ♪
translation.zh: 我从出生起 就与皮肤病作斗争

translation.en: ♪ That has caused me sadness And woe, woe, woe ♪
translation.zh: 这让我很难过 呜呼哀哉

translation.en: ♪ Whenever other kids saw me Under the sun's rays ♪
translation.zh: 当其他孩子看到我在阳光下

translation.en: ♪ In no time, they'd be calling me A freak or a raisin ♪
translation.zh: 他们会说我是怪胎或葡萄干

translation.en: ♪ So I resigned myself To being left behind ♪
♪ There's nothing wrong With being moisturized ♪
♪ Why should I stay below the shore? ♪

translation.zh: 永远是二流 对我鄙夷的

translation.en: ♪ To the air-breathing Land-walking sun kissers I despise? ♪
translation.zh:
呼吸空气 陆地行走
晒太阳的生物低头

translation.en: ♪ So watch me rise up, open the skies up ♪
translation.zh: 看我雄起 撕开天幕

translation.en: ♪ And take the world by storm ♪
♪ I'll flood the dry lands Low and highlands ♪
translation.zh:
我要淹没一切干燥的土地
低地和高地

translation.en: ♪ He's taking the world by storm ♪
translation.zh: 他用狂风暴雨席卷世界

translation.en: ♪ For years, this un-phibian demon's Been rehearsing a scheme ♪
translation.zh:
多年来 邪恶的水底生物
一直在悉心谋划

translation.en: ♪ Now stand back 'Cause I'm gonna perform it ♪
translation.zh: 看好了 好戏终于要上演

translation.en: ♪ And nobody will deny my power When I take the world by storm ♪
translation.zh:
我用风雨吞噬世界
没人能否认我的力量

translation.en: -♪ No more sunshine, no more flowers ♪ -♪ Benbo, Babbo ♪
translation.zh: 再也没有阳光 没有花朵

translation.en: -♪ Only endless power showers ♪ -♪ Benbo, Babbo ♪
[Dragon King] ♪ No more groundhogs Or earthworms ♪
translation.zh: 再也没有土拨鼠 没有蚯蚓

translation.en: ♪ And no more ruined frizzy perms ♪
♪ No more islands, no more nations ♪
translation.zh: 不再有岛屿 不再有国家
不会有人因为雨天取消活动

translation.en: ♪ No more sadness, no more crying ♪
translation.zh: 不再悲伤 不再哭泣
再也没有干等着面试结果的人

translation.en: ♪ Drying up on the big final ♪
translation.zh: 再也没有干等着面试结果的人 重复一遍

translation.en: ♪ And take the world by storm ♪
♪ No, I'm taking the world by storm ♪
translation.zh: 不 我要用风雨吞噬世界
所以 我要掀起惊涛骇浪

translation.en: ♪ So big they'll become the norm ♪

translation.zh: 我们的国王会一统天下

translation.en: -[Dragon King] ♪ Open the skies up ♪ -♪ He's makin' it rain ♪
translation.zh: 撕开天幕 他让大雨倾盆

translation.en: ♪ And take the whole dried world ♪

translation.zh: 你们好 陆地上的人类！

translation.en: Who wants the honor of drowning first?

translation.zh: 嘿 脆皮！我的金箍棒呢？

translation.en: I believe I said invite only!
I am the mighty Dragon King,

translation.zh: 大洪水制造者 人类杀手

translation.en: -[Lin] I got ya. Head for high ground! -[child] Mama!
Everybody, get to the top of the hill!
-Monkey! You're not alone. I can help you! -[Monkey King snarls]
translation.zh: 猴子！你并不孤单！我可以帮你！

translation.en: [Lin] Spare my poor village, and I'll tell you his weakness.
translation.zh:
放过我可怜的村子
我告诉你他的弱点

translation.en: Lightning. It's the only thing that can defeat him.
translation.zh: 闪电 这是唯一能打败你的东西

translation.en: Fry him up. No one'll miss him.
translation.zh: 把他炸了 没人会想念他的
谢谢你的帮助 孩子

translation.en: Yes! That's it! Wring him out!
Okay, you can have the stick!
How about I get custody just on weekends?
translation.zh: 我就周末有监护权如何？

translation.en: Oh yeah, we need a new career.
translation.zh: 对 我们需要新工作了

translation.en: You did it. You defeated the Dragon King--
translation.zh: 你成功了 你打败了龙王…

translation.en: [Jade Emperor] This has gone too far.
Hand me the Royal Horn of Desperation.
But the Buddha said to let him find his own way.
translation.zh: 可是如来佛说让他找到自己的路

translation.en: [scoffs] The Buddha speaks in riddles. No one understands him.
translation.zh:
佛祖爱说谜语
没人知道他是什么意思

translation.en: You shall spend your immortality alone,
translation.zh: 你要独自度过你的永生

translation.en: Now I will reign supreme over all of you!
translation.zh: 现在我要统治你们所有人！

translation.en: -[Monkey King growls] -Please, you have to stop.
♪ Who's the giant primate Who is making a mess? Monkey King! ♪
translation.zh: 大闹天宫的大猴子是谁？美猴王！

translation.en: I did this. I let this happen.
translation.zh: 是我干的 我让这种事发生了

translation.en: ♪ Who can swing around The biggest stick… ♪
translation.zh: 谁能在这片土地上挥舞最大的棍子？

translation.en: -[Monkey King laughs] -[Lin] He has goodness inside him.
[Buddha] Then help him find his way.
translation.zh: 那就帮他找到自己的路

translation.en: What? But how do I do that?
Monkey King is my old title.
translation.zh: 美猴王 是我以前的称号

translation.en: You will address me as the Great Sage,
How can we show him he's not the center of the universe?
translation.zh:
我们要怎么让他知道
他不是宇宙的中心？

translation.en: I got it! [deep voice] I have a challenge for you, Great Sage.
translation.zh: 我知道了！ 我有个挑战 大圣

translation.en: -What is it? -[Lin as Buddha] Something worthy of you.
[Lin as Buddha] If you are powerful enough to leap from my palm,
translation.zh: 如果你强大到能逃出我的掌心

translation.en: the kingdom of heaven will be yours to rule.
Hang on. What did he just say?
[deep voice] But if you fail, you will do a long penance here on Earth.
translation.zh: 但如果你失败了 你就要在人间苦修很久

translation.en: I just have to leave your hand?
You're on, but you're gonna feel pretty foolish in about two sec…
translation.zh: 没问题 但你很快就会觉得自己很蠢…

translation.en: This is the edge of the universe, Stick!
translation.zh: 这是宇宙的边缘了 金箍棒

translation.en: Yeah, I totally should. Just to prove I was here.
translation.zh:
对 我真的应该这样
为了证明我来过

translation.en: Ha ha! And now to make my other mark.
translation.zh: 现在我要留下另一个印记

translation.en: -[Monkey King sighs] -[Lin as Buddha] Stop that, Monkey.
[Lin as Buddha] You never left my hand, Monkey King.
translation.zh:
-你没有离开我的手掌 美猴王
-什么？

translation.en: Wait a second. No! No. No, no, no, no, no! No! No!
Whatever just happened, that's cheating! Do-over!

translation.zh: 小石子？你应该在里面吗？

translation.en: -Are you even supposed to be in there? -Absolutely not. Isn't it great?
translation.zh: 小石子？你应该在里面吗？ 绝对不该 是不是很棒？

translation.en: You tricked me! Not fair! That's two against one.
translation.zh: 你骗了我！不公平！二对一

translation.en: I'm sorry. This is the only way to help you.
translation.zh: 对不起 只有这样才能帮到你

translation.en: Stop! No, no, no, no, no! No! [strains]
[grunts] This is so exactly what I wanted to happen.
Told you, you'd feel foolish. Ha ha.
translation.zh: 就说你会觉得自己愚蠢吧

translation.en: you are now on the path of meditation and self-reflection.
translation.zh: 你现在要开始冥想思过了

translation.en: I was born from a rock, you know?
This is where I thrive! Monkey King reigns supreme! [strains]
translation.zh:
这是我的快乐老家！
美猴王所向披靡！

translation.en: you will have found your way.
He's just a little monkey looking for a place to belong.
translation.zh: 他只是个寻找归属感的小猴子

translation.en: Hey, Lin, where's our hero going today?
translation.zh: 嘿 小琳 我们的英雄今天要去哪里？

translation.en: [Babbo] And two extra-large milk tea bobas.
Want honey with that? I made it myself.
translation.zh: 想要蜂蜜吗？我亲手做的

translation.en: My gosh! How do I awaken to nothingness?
translation.zh: 我的天！我要如何在虚空中醒来？

translation.en: I'm the king of being humble!
Go away! I'm busy thinking of all the ways to get back at you.
translation.zh: 走开！我在想办法报复你呢

translation.en: I came to say goodbye before Buddha closes up your mountain.
translation.zh:
我是在佛祖闭合你的山前
来和你道别的

translation.en: I know you're mad, but you were out of control.
translation.zh: 我知道你很生气 但你失控了

translation.en: [groans] Okay, you don't have to remind me.
Taking on all the gods probably wasn't my best idea.
translation.zh: 对付所有神仙不是我最妙的点子

translation.en: I really messed up, didn't I?
translation.zh: 我真的搞砸了 不是吗？

translation.en: Monkey, you were born from a rock,
translation.zh: 猴子 你从石头里出生

translation.en: and all you ever wanted was to be loved.
I made a difference. We both did.
translation.zh: 我改变了世界 我们都有份

translation.en: I really am your number one fan.
translation.zh: 我真的是你的头号粉丝

translation.en: Well, I guess a little pebble did make a big wave.
translation.zh: 好吧 小石子确实能掀起巨浪

translation.en: Well, we didn't do it all alone.
Stick! Buddy! I missed you so much!

translation.zh: 继续书写你的卷轴 小琳

translation.en: [Lin] I kept my promise and did great things.
translation.zh: 我信守诺言 做了大事

translation.en: And Monkey, I'm sure he'll be out in no time.
translation.zh: 而猴子 我相信他很快就会出来的

translation.en: Monkey, demons run wild across the land.
The Buddha sent us to release you.
Are you ready to join our journey to the West?
translation.zh: 你准备好开启通往西天的旅程了吗？

translation.en: I have awoken with peace in my heart,
and you wish for me to fight?
Come on, Stick. The world needs us.
translation.zh: 来吧 金箍棒 这个世界需要我们

translation.en: ♪ Who's the handsome hero We all love and adore? ♪
translation.zh: 谁是人见人爱的帅气英雄？

translation.en: ♪ Who has demons screaming When he knocks on their door? ♪
translation.zh: 谁让妖魔鬼怪闻风丧胆？

translation.en: ♪ Who's a mighty fighter Who is brave and spunky ♪
translation.zh: 谁是骁勇善战 身材健硕的

translation.en: ♪ And also a bit of a hunk? ♪
♪ Who's the ape you can't escape When he hunts you down? ♪
translation.zh: 谁是让人无处遁形的猴？

translation.en: ♪ Who's the chimp All the simple people will crown? ♪
♪ Who's the simian you'll find shimmying Up to the top ♪
translation.zh: 谁是轻轻一跃就冲上云霄

translation.en: ♪ And you know he won't stop Till he's won? ♪
translation.zh: 不打败对手不罢休的猴？

translation.en: ♪ That's right, he's the Monkey King! ♪
[Dragon King] ♪ So watch me rise up ♪
♪ And take the world by storm ♪
♪ I'll flood the dry lands Low and highlands ♪
translation.zh:
我要淹没一切干燥的土地
低地和高地

translation.en: ♪ And take the world by storm ♪
[Babbo and Benbo] ♪ Hey, hey He'll take the world by storm ♪
translation.zh: 他用狂风暴雨席卷世界

translation.en: ♪ Hey, hey He'll take the world by storm ♪
translation.zh: 他用狂风暴雨席卷世界

translation.en: ♪ Hey, hey He'll take the world by storm ♪
translation.zh: 他用狂风暴雨席卷世界

translation.en: ♪ Hey, hey He'll take the world by storm ♪
translation.zh: 他用狂风暴雨席卷世界

translation.en: ♪ He'll make it rain Watch the whole world love it ♪
translation.zh:
